alert.note: Alert for Brown; Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 2:44PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BROWN AND NORTHEASTERN OUTAGAMIE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM CDT... At 244 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Black Creek, or 14 miles north of Appleton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Bay, Black Creek, Bellevue Town, Oneida, De Pere, Howard, Ashwaubenon, Allouez, Ledgeview, and Hobart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
